page.title: 13A Day in the Life of a Child
page.content: I WAS WOKEN UP AT 08.00 BY MY SISTER BECAUSE I WAS TIRED. BREAKFAST WAS SCRAMBLED EGGS ON TOAST AND MILK. BY 08.20 I HAD BRUSHED MY HAIR AND WASHED MY FACE AND TEETH. AFTER COLLECTING MY COAT AND SCHOOL BAG I LEFT FOR SCHOOL IN THE CAR WITH MY YOUNGER SISTER. AS I AM A MONITOR I TOOK THE REGISTERS ROUND TO ALL THE CLASSES AT 08.45.WHEN SCHOOL STARTED AT 09.00 IT WAS INFANT ASSEMBLY SO I STARTED MATHS STRAIGHT AWAY.DURING BREAK I DRANK MY MILK AND DID SOME SEWING.I DID SOME WRITTEN WORK AFTER PLAY UNTIL LUNCH.I HAVE A SCHOOL DINNER WHICH WAS MINCE,CARROTS AND MASHED POTATOES FOLLOWED BY DOUGHNUTS OR AN APPLE. AFTER TAKING THE AFTERNOON REGISTERS ROUND I PLAYED PIGGY BACKS WITH MY FRIENDS.DURING AFTERNOON SCHOOL I FINISHED THE SAMPLER I HAVE BEEN MAKING AND READ MY BOOK CALLED "THE PHOENIX AND THE CARPET" UNTIL 15.00.
